text: Definitely for your showreel I would add debris and dust. That would refine it and just make it better. I mean the shredder compared to the objects. Let's say you have 20 threads going along the shredder. What happens if you made it 40 threads along the length, so they were thinner, or what if you made 2 rows of shredding, so it was twice as wide? Just things to experiment in your free time?
